glass_shard.name: Glass Shard
glass_shard.description: A fragment of crystallized time. Cuts that which moves out of rhythm.

vial_liquid_seconds.name: Vial of Liquid Seconds
vial_liquid_seconds.description: A golden, twitching fluid. The rich drank time like wine, believing it would keep their glass skins from growing dull.

stopped_watch.name: The Stopped Watch
stopped_watch.description: A pocket watch with hands fused to the face. It pulses with a phantom weight, heavier than lead. The Architect did not lose it; they left it behind when time became a burden.

rusty_key_hand.name: The Rusty Key-Hand
rusty_key_hand.description: A severed automaton hand, rigor-locked around an iron key. It refuses to let go, even in rust. Opens Maintenance Doors that were sealed to keep the silence out.

breath_of_creator.name: Breath of the Creator
breath_of_creator.description: He gave his breath to make them beautiful, but he had no breath left to tell them they were fragile.

tuning_fork_spear.name: Tuning Fork Spear
tuning_fork_spear.description: A massive, two-pronged spear made of heavy iron. It hums with a low, headache-inducing frequency. Standard issue for the Silence Guard, used to skewer dissonance.

cracked_mirror.name: A Cracked Mirror
cracked_mirror.description: The glass reflects the smog and the steel, but your face is absent. Only a hollow ache remains where your image should be. Proof that you are a ghost in this machine.

foremans_ledger.name: Foreman's Ledger
foremans_ledger.description: A log of 'Soft Units' marked for the furnace. The final entry is stamped 12:00:00, repeated until the ink ran dry. The exact second the world decided to stop breathing.

oxidized_whistle.name: Oxidized Whistle
oxidized_whistle.description: A copper whistle coated in verdigris. It produces a sound so high-pitched it vibrates rust off of metal.

scale_of_decay.name: Scale of Decay
scale_of_decay.description: A flake of metal from a beast that should not exist. It feels warm, like a fever.

perfect_prism.name: Perfect Prism
perfect_prism.description: A geometric impossibility. Light enters it but never leaves, bouncing internally forever.

shard_of_narcissus.name: Shard of Narcissus
shard_of_narcissus.description: A piece of a mirror that reflects your true self... or perhaps the self you wish you were.

generals_log.name: General's Log: Entry 404
generals_log.description: 'We locked the door not to keep them out, but to keep Him in. The Conductor's song... it doesn't end. It just gets louder.'

sheet_music_fragment.name: Sheet Music Fragment
sheet_music_fragment.description: A torn page of the score. The notes are written in blood and oil. It ends abruptly at the 13th measure.
